section.p: 'A relatively large group of people organized under a single, usually independent government; a country.' - American Heritage Dictionary. An organization created to govern a country, which has the power to grant citizenship to its people.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Code
Identifies the nation. This would ordinarily be an Id, but because there are a finite number of tribes, nations are normally represented as codes.
"Contains the information related to a person's country citizenship. For country citizenship HL7 recommends using ISO table 3166...." - HL7 Version 2.8, PID-26.
